item.description:
**AFTERNOON TEA UPDATE LOCATION/TIME CHANGE***

Once again we could not get a reservation at the Taj hotel so we will be going to the Swan's Cafe at the Park Plaza Hotel.
This is one of the few hotels in Boston with an actual Tea Sommelier ( Cynthia Gold ) so it should be some wonderful tea! Directions to the Hotel are available http://maps.google.co.... We will meet in the hotel lobby at 3:00 now! I have to confirm the reservation by Friday so please note the changes and RSVP YES or NO by then.

I apologize for the confusion!

****

It's time for another afternoon tea meetup!

Put on your Sunday's best and join us for tea, overpriced finger sandwiches, and fancy cakes.

The meetup will be Sunday December 13th at the Park Plaza in downtown Boston.
item.name: Afternoon Tea Meetup
